ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups Reddi-wip® Original Dairy Whipped Topping
½ cup dry red velvet cake mix
4 tablespoons Reddi-wip® Original Dairy Whipped Topping

cookingTips: Mix ingredients just until combined to avoid overmixing
Microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring between, to prevent overcooking
Top with whipped topping immediately after cooking while warm
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the quick microwave method and explain how whipped topping keeps these mug cakes moist and light without traditional batter ingredients.
